mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_gasq_eshop( id, name, business_model_id, seller_id, publish, status, code, operation_base_status, third_part, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{businessModelId}, #{sellerId}, #{publish}, #{status}, #{code}, #{operationBaseStatus}, #{thirdPart}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE basic_gasq_eshop SET name = #{name}, business_model_id = #{businessModelId}, seller_id = #{sellerId}, publish = #{publish}, status = #{status}, operation_base_status = #{operationBaseStatus}, third_part = #{thirdPart}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE code = #{code}
